mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_board
where mtitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where mcontent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where mcontent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or mtitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where mwriter like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select seqno,userid,mtitle,mwriter,to_char(mregdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as mregdate, mcontent,likecnt,dislikecnt from tbl_board where seqno = #{seqno}
select (last_number-1) as last_number from all_sequences where sequence_name = 'TBL_BOARD_SEQ' and sequence_owner = 'SPRINGDEV'
select tbl_board_seq.nextval as seqno from dual

select nvl(max(seqno),'0') as seqno from tbl_board where seqno < #{seqno}
where mtitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where mcontent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where mcontent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or mtitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where mwriter like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select nvl(max(seqno),'0') as seqno from tbl_board where seqno > #{seqno}
where mtitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where mcontent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where mcontent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or mtitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where mwriter like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select fileseqno, org_filename, filesize from tbl_file where seqno = #{seqno}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set mtitle=#{mtitle},mcontent=#{mcontent} where seqno=#{seqno}
